channel.title: Friendship is the miracle on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Friendship is the miracle on Game6r

item.title: Horse Coloring Book
item.description: Start the process of the game Drawing a pony friendship is a miracle and invent your own horse, using all the available options for this. Change the color of the horse’s coat, choose the shape of the mane and tail, the color of the eyes, add all kinds of decorations. If desired, you can include wings or a horn in the pony image, or even both.
